content.detailedDescription: It was just before 9:30 when i got a call from my aunt who was down the street at my grandparents house. she said that her, my grandparents and our cousins saw twenty lights in the sky. one of my family members there works at wright-patt and they couldn't identify them. me and my parents went outside and saw two of them. outside it smelt like a skunk. one object was hovering, just visible between the sight of two trees. we looked a little to the west and saw another orange orb. this one was still at first and then started flying very fast towards the other. just before it went behind the sight of a tree it dissappeard. we looked back at the other orb that seemed to be hovering or slightly moving to the northeast. just then we saw the blinking lights of an aircraft come from just out of view heading towards the object. that orb then stopped and got dim, just before it dissappeared. the plane continued its path but slowed down a little. once we got back inside i got a slight headache. we called back my aunt and she said they just dissapeared. we also realized they were heading against the wind.
content.summary: Got call from family then went outside to see light for myself and saw 2 orange orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a stop sign, 1 block parallel to i94e. it was still daylight out.
i saw a silver cylinder cross my path through my windshield. it was travel
ing south, right above the tree-line. there were no windows or markings on
it. i would estimate the speed at 30 mph. the size would be between 40 to 50 feet. it had no right to be there, if i had the family shotgun, i could
have nailed it. they are suppose to be in somebody elses neighborhood or
on tv.  im going out and buy a shotgun or rifle right now. i know it was a probe. i will provide a sketch.
content.summary: Silver object, no lights, no tail, no wings, i could have shot it down

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone out into the back yard to feed the dogs. it was crisp and totally clear sky with excellent visibility. i looked up and saw a planetary sized light to the northwest at about 80 degrees from the horizon. it caught my eye because it was bright and i had never seen a star or planet in that position at that time. i looked closely at it and it was white and starlike and perfectly circular. in something less than a minute of observation, it faded out - not twinkling out like a star and other stars that were less visible were still plainly visible in the brightening sky. it faded out quickly - just disappeared. 

i looked for it for another minute or so and it did not reappear. it was stationary and should have still been visible in some form. 

i have seen iridium flares and know it was not this. there was no change in light intensity.
content.summary: Looked up from back yard and saw bright planetary sized circle that did not move and faded out rapidly in less than 1 minute.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone out into the back yard to feed the dogs. it was crisp and totally clear sky with excellent visibility. i looked up and saw a planetary sized light to the northwest at about 80 degrees from the horizon. it caught my eye because it was bright and i had never seen a star or planet in that position at that time. i looked closely at it and it was white and starlike and perfectly circular. in something less than a minute of observation, it faded out - not twinkling out like a star and other stars that were less visible were still plainly visible in the brightening sky. it faded out quickly - just disappeared. 

i looked for it for another minute or so and it did not reappear. it was stationary and should have still been visible in some form. 

i have seen iridium flares and know it was not this. there was no change in light intensity.
content.summary: Looked up from back yard and saw bright planetary sized circle that did not move and faded out rapidly in less than 1 minute.

content.detailedDescription: First noticed this object a few weeks ago. i've noticed this light 5 times in the past 3 weeks. definitely wasn't an airplane or a helicopter. i live not to far from the willow grove air base so i definitely know what a airplane & helicopter look like at night. it's was not a star, planet or satellite. was able to watch this object for about 30 mins. went back in the house & came out to check on it about an hr later it was gone. it was a clear night out. this object seemed to at times grow extremely bright & then dim. looked like it was rotating. hovered for 15 minutes & then very slowly started to move to the east. several airplanes and a helicopter in the area. way more then i normally see on a given night. and they were all in the area of this object. my husband was also puzzled by this object. attaching a picture which does not do it justice it was several times brighter than the picture.
content.summary: Star-like object that seemed to be rotating.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside in back to relax and skywatch for awhile.
noticed object as soon as i sat down inbetween a tree branch.
at first i thought it was a passenger jet which stage and fly toward midway airport right past my house,sometimes i have counted as many as six at a time. but this one did not move at all it just hovered motionless and it was seemingly much brighter than jet lghts and much larger. there were i think five jets during the sighting that went past it, at that time i was thinking it was a planet as they had no reaction to it so i reasoned it must be much higher than it appeared, 

however after several minutes i noticed it was descending lower as i lost sight through the tree branch and i realized it was not a planet, i could not figure out why the planes were not reacting to it they were moving below it on their flight path and i wanted to see a higher flying one go over it as i probably saw over 20 aircraft at different heights but none went over it the whole time. after awhile i noticed it was descending lower and to the right.

as i wrote it was extremely bright i keep binoculars with me and it was really bright looking through the binoculars. right toward the last maybe 10 minutes i got the verification i needed to see that it was something other than a plane. from the south i saw a little tiny light heading towards the object and eventhough things shake around in the binoculars i saw it move past it really close and i saw it move behind it and reappear, then i saw what i had never seen before this plane actually went around it and came past it again before moving off to the north, the plane looked tiny compared to the object.

at this time it started to descend more rapidly but still slow and its color changed to orange and it appeared to almost be fading out but it descended out of sight but i could not tell.

there must have been other people on the ground who saw this besides me, it was cold out but still it reallly stuck out, all the lower altitude passenger jets absolutely had to see this as evidenced by the one that circled around it, there is the tell, another plane reacted to it.

i watch for and have seen things in the sky which were much more crazy than this sigjting so i pretty much was just wanting to see if other planes reacted to it, that was a wow moment for me, or it moved off quickly, changed directions, went straight up or disappeared or amything else out of the ordinary.

i told my wife after it happened as she just came back home, my daughter witnessed the object with me three different times during the sighting the last time she saw it i told her about the circling plane, i guess the cool part was it was over an hour in duration.

anyway i do not know what it was so its unidentifed, i would really like to know if it showed up on radar and who was thempilot that circled it though. also i took a picture with a cheap disposable camera when i get the film developed if it shows up i will submit it but i hily doubt it will show anything.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed  a very bright light  low in the sky for one hour and three minutes moving very slowly until out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Nezw  ufo sigthings report
content.summary: Sightings

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my girlfriend smoking a cigarette when she pointed out a bright light moving behind some trees across the street. at first i figured it was an airplane, but as it emerged i was shocked at how bright and close by it was. the object appeared as a very bright aura of green/blueish light. at first it moved slowly at a distance of around 300 yards away. it moved steadily past and at one point ascended 300 feet or so without slowing down or speeding up the whole time. i thought about running inside to grab my phone to record it, but at first i didn't want to miss it so i opted out. as it grew further in the distance after passing, i climbed atop my car for a better view thinking i wouldnt see it again. a slightly jet-like hum was heard coming from the craft, but other than that it was completely silent even when it was within 300 feet of me. after i saw it nearly a mile away i hopped down to continue smoking my cig and discussing it with my girlfriend who had saw the whole thing as well. not more than a minute later we see the object fly almost right above our heads across out street at a high rate of speed back in the direction we originally saw it come from. after quickly leaving our line of sight over the neighbors trees across the street, the object reemerged from some trees down the block flying in almost the same pattern it had originally, only this time faster. i saw it repeat this pattern once more before going back inside, but it is important to note that the light emitted from the object was brighter than any man made light seen. it would burn my vision a bit from looking at it. also to add to the credibility there were several man made aircraft in the sky at the time i could easily differentiate from. i did manage to get some video but the zoom on the phone camera was horrible and you cant see very much
content.summary: Observed object multiple times as it circled around. plenty of airplanes in the air, this wasn't one. it was brighter than anything i've seen and very low to the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
One night i slept in the bed of my truck allowing a friend to drive while i slept. after a long while i woke wonderimg where we were on the trek home.When i opened my eys i thoight we had pulled under a big truckstop canopy with bright white ligjimgit wasnt that..I saw what i thought
 at first was a very large bright white skyscraper with a lot of windows in multiple floors of offices...Towering over us and most nearby objects but it wasn't it was actually a  huge hovering ufo over interstate 40.  i thought man, i hope this thing dont see me laying here in the back of a pickup truck i would be an easy target..My froend was drivimg very fast and i thoughtih was due to the ufo butdue to the angle in tbe sky that it was hovering most people may not had seen it but i was lying on my back looking up.
 
 i have no clue how large that thing was but it reminded me of the starship  on battlestar galactica it was just as white and no smaller than thier tv scifi model. it looks so much like the tv show sci fi space ship that i actu
ally had to wonder if they didn't see one too!?

 i have nothing to gain by fabricating a story about something like this i just hope someone else did see it
that night and know the reason they r comng to our state?

 whatever the reason, we are being visited on a regular
thier tv mpdel...
 basis and we are not alone!T!!
 being native american i have heard a lot of stories ab
out visitors i didn


't believe them now i k

now!
content.summary: Very large white skyship with multiple levels with windows  hovered over interstate 40 @ icard exit...
content.locationName: Near Iard Exit of I 40, North Carolina

content.detailedDescription: At night, when it was partly cloudy, i was outside with my sister feeding our dogs outside when i glanced up to the sky . than, all of sudden, an object caught my sight. this object was a large dark outlined triangular shaped object that had 5 white lights that were located at the edge of the this object. this lights made a v-shape. this object was flying slightly above the clouds. i noticed it's triangular shape when it wasn't in cloud cover and noticed it's dark outline. the way the object flew was in a straight line, slightly faster than commercial airplanes. the object, as it flew straight, rotated from when i first sighted it till i lost its sight of about 20 - 30 degrees. i lost sight of the object after it went behind the tree line. at first, after viewing the object, i felt confused because i thought it was a plane but the object didn't make a sound as well as the way it didn't make a flight path the same as an airplane.
content.summary: Large dark triangle with 5 lights that made a v-shape

content.detailedDescription: While my wife was watching the kids at the bus stop she noticed this object hovering at high altitude and sort of bouncing around.  it didn't make noise that she could hear and was moving quickly when moved. after a few minutes it just seemed to disappear.  she felt shocked and a little confused on what she was seeing. she quickly grabbed the camera and took a couple of pictures.
content.summary: Wife noticed object hovering and moving around back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
I had to take our collie out for a walk . i all ways look at the stars and just saw the ufo . it look
just like and orb that had a tail on it.
content.summary: My collie had to go out so i went with her and was look at the stars and the i saw it .

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Diamond like orb hovering in the sky about 1 mile to 2 miles away, from where i was it looked to be about the size of a skittle or m&m.  it stayed in about the same place for 45 mins and then lowered quite quickly below a neighboring treeline, but then slowly hovered back up at a 90 degree angle back to about the same place i had first seen it. its been about 2 hrs now, and still visible. but here and there moves slightly up and down. hope since this thing is just "hangin" around like this in such a populated area, that someone else will see and or report it as well.
content.summary: Diamond like orb hovering in the sky about 1 mile to 2 miles away, from where i was it looked to be about the size of a skittle or m&m.

content.detailedDescription:
Heard loud aircraft and looked outside to see jets pursuing what appeared to be a glowing orb. 

i was working in my garage when i heard a loud aircraft. this was louder than your typical plane. i opened the door and looked up immediately. right as i did i saw an orb fly directly over me at very fast speeds. right after that what appeared to be jets chasing it. as it flew right over my house, i kept watching them as they flew away over the tree line. they were going really fast. a typical plane takes about 3 minutes to pass by. these guys were going so fast that i only had what seemed like a few seconds to see them.

the orb was a white light that didn't appear to be blinking. the jets had your typical lights on them and they were blinking. their lights seemed awfully bright though, maybe it was because they were so low to the ground. 

as the orb and what i will say were jets were almost out of sight, the orb appeared to have an outline of a triangle but it almost appeared to be cloaked. 

if this was a triangle craft, it wouldn't be the first one i have ever seen, back in 2001 i saw another sighting of a very large triangle craft that was hovering over a river. that's why when i first saw the outline of the triangle i was thinking that my mind was just wanting to see a triangle craft again. after reading more reports online that saw similar last night, i think it could have been another one, only smaller than the last. 

i wish i could talk to those pilots and get some facts. 

also, their flight path was straight, no turns. they were flying really low to the ground. if i were to estimate i would say 2,000 - 5,000 feet but it would be really hard for me to judge that accurately.

this happened at almost exactly midnight.
content.summary: Heard loud aircraft looked outside to see jets pursuing what appeared to be a glowing orb

content.detailedDescription:
Just got back, from chico,ca. from taking daughter to the dentist. we got home around 5;30 pm 10-24-2013. i went out back to have a cigerette. i glanced up seen to lights at first thought, 2 stars then did a double take 
and said to myself its to early for stars, then was thinking plane, but  objects they weren't moving fast enough. so i looked for venus to see if it was out yet, did not see the planet which should be southwest from my location about 20 degrees or so off the horizon. i ran in house grabbed my binos and started looking ,it made the objects kind of blurry. couldn't get
a good view thats when i called the wife out to look. she came out followed
by my daughter and they looked seen the same thing thats when i grabbed the
telescope 5 inch reflector on tri pod set it up had a 40mm lens in it focused on a round kind of flattend top bottom glow with red light on top almost like a round clam shell it had grooved lines in it verticly or at 
least like shadows.  turned scope on other object to compare same but had
white light on top. i watched it for about 30 mins total and through scope 
approx. 15 mins. they were driffting towards the east, as it got darker
they just slowly faded out.
content.summary: I seen two lights in the sky and thought they were stars, until i got the telescope out.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard on oct 21 @ 1257am i first noticed what appeared to be a star blinking.  then thought it was a plane. i watched thinking it must be coming straight toward or away from me because it didn't move. i used a tree branch to gage it. i then used binocular and it seemed to take shape of a circle with lights along outside and inside edges. not trusting my view i changed to a rifle scope. i then clearly saw it was an elongated triangle with lights inside and out. it glew brightly and colors changed in this pattern yellow green blue white then orange.  i didn't have a camera that would have done this justice. it just stayed in same place about an hour or more i stopped watching but when inside i drew it marked date and time and pattern of lights. next 2-3 nights at same time i came out to see if it was a star but have not even seen a star in that same area and no other flashing objects at all. this experience left me thinking if anyone else saw it but i may never know. i have had other experiences in my life i regret not reporting and didn't want this left untold. b!
content.summary: Watched triangle craft changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
Co-worker told me her husband observed 2 orange glowing ufos last pm while
driving and stopped to watch   he said very odd never saw anything like it before  it hoovered made turns and finally went very fast straight up and disappeared  said another car on opposite side of the road started driving
off the road and slowing down as if he was watching this too.
content.summary: Event not seen by me  second hand story

content.detailedDescription: After returning home after a meal in a restaurant, as my dad and i were almost home, we observed an orange orb appear in the night sky, to the south east. it appeared, and quickly faded out. we discussed it, and agreed that our area is visited often. then, i was in my bedroom, playing a video game. it about 11:57 pm. my home stereo started to get static, then about a minute later, the sound level rose and fell. then, my internet service for my game console started acting up, disconnecting and reconnecting. then, my cell phone service went down, saying "service down". then, my two cockatiel birds started to chatter wildly, and then all of a sudden just stopped, dead quiet.  i then had a headache start all of a sudden, and i got the feeling that somebody was watching me. i got up to look out of my bedroom window, and that's when i saw it. the partial moon was just above the local ridges, and i saw a shape in the dim moonlight. it wage huge. it was moving in a direction towards the moon, and at that point, i could see the entire shape. it was a long triangle shape, with a rounded leading tip. it was fairly thick, with rounded edges, and a curving top, front tip to stern. no lights were to be seen. it was moving in a straight path, at a moderate enough pace for me to see it clearly. then, it moved in between the moon and me, and completely blocked out the moon. it then continued on, with the moon reappearing, and then disappeared when it went over the ridges. about a minute later, my electronics started working normally. it freaked me out. after i had calmed down, about twenty minutes later, my headache went away as fast as it came.
content.summary: Home stereo sound level faded in an out. other deviced acted up. looked out window , observed the ufo>

content.detailedDescription: Mites ufo alien
content.summary: Minters sightings

content.detailedDescription:
Google earth image dated 31/7/2009
lat 33.8880586929539
long -106.99149906635284
about 6 miles sw of san antonio nm

strange white circular object about 10 meters in diameter on top of table mountain with no visible road leading to it.

any idea what it is?
content.summary: Round white object ontop of table mountain in desert nm

content.detailedDescription: I was studying in the terrace of my apartment when i saw this strange object flying through the sky from my left to the right. first i though it was just an airplane because of the green light blinking. i kept looking as was too slow for being a plane when suddenly it changed the direction and started moving to the left. i went into my apartment to take my phone to start recording the scene. when i came back, the ufo was still up in the sky. after few seconds, it started to descend, turning red and then dissapeared from my sight. never had an experience like this before, it was scary!
content.summary: Strange  object flying from one side to another, up and down and changing colors from red to green

content.detailedDescription:
Nephew shouts out to me loudly.. uncle look, whats that over there. i ran out to see what the heck he's yelling about and he point to the northern sky. we are staring at a light coming in from the north but also with a huge orange flame coming from it, but the flames appeared to be almost like an object entering the atmosphere, almost heart shape. this went on for a good minute maybe even 2 than the flame died out but we could clearly see the the light still heading south for about 15 secs and than it turned east for another 2 minutes than went it seemed like it just went outside the atmosphere, it just disappeared. i couldn't explain it but it freak the hell out me. there were at least 4 large planes in formation to land at lax coming in from east to west and i know the 1st and 2nd must of had a clear view of the orange/red flame also i could clearly see the blinking safety lights on all four incoming planes but the object had blinking lights. 
i know others saw what i saw.
content.summary: Light with giant fireball appears to enter atmosphere than disappears over la

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from the grocery store at 9pm on 24 oct 2013, and turned southbound on coronado street.  i looked up towards the southern sky and saw a craft.

the craft was almost saucer-shaped and had 2 to 3 dozen lights on it (in circular patterns starting from the middle outwards).  the lights were different colors (which is what caught my eye in the first place).  they were red, yellow, and blue; mostly yellow, though.  the craft was of a grey color (it did not match the black of the evening sky).

i stopped the car because i couldn���t believe what i was seeing.  while parked, i watched as the craft moved west to east.  it was rather slow, but in total, i only saw it for twenty seconds.  i could not take pictures, as it was too dim to show up on my phone camera.

it went out of view (thanks to tree-lined streets), and i went home.

when i saw the craft, i was baffled.  afterwards, i was scared and excited about what i saw.  there's no other way to describe it.
content.summary: Saw a craft fly from west to east in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: Was out watering plants. first object was bright orange red passing from nw to sw and looked like a small consolation orion, except that instead of 3 stars for a belt, it was one very bright orange-red star-like orb. many red stars orbited around the central orb. moved in an arc and changed direction from nw to sw to ne. then faded out. this was followed by a 3 regularly spaced orange-red orbs once every 2 minutes (approximately) that did not have auxiliary lights around them. all moved nw to sw over the gulf of mexico.  no sound. certainly not an aircraft of any type. first object noticed at 23:38, followed by the 3 follow-up objects at regular intervals.  looked like what would be a roman candle, except at much further distance and higher altitude - at least 45 degrees above horizon. first object had glowing objects around the central orb. moved to the sw and then stopped abruptly. quickly changed directions and moved rapidly to the ne and then faded.  follow on objects arced across the sky and faded below the horizon. much brighter than any star with a red-orange glow that would not be typical of an aircraft.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several bright orange/red starlike objects

content.detailedDescription: Took dog outside for his bathroom break and was surprised to see a strange object overhead on a path from dallas to irving (east to west).  at first i thought it was perhaps the space station, as this is sometimes observed just after dark on a clear night.  however, the space station is usually quite bright when visible.  this object was faint and had an irregular flight path.  also, the object came to a complete stop and hovered.  as it hovered, a set of faint yellow-orange lights were visible.  then the object suddenly and sharply began to move my direction in a descent and for a brief moment i could observe a large dark cylindrical object dotted with yellow-orange lights.  the object became faint again and was barely visible as it appeared to ascend and then to move in a sw direction.  after another minute i lost visual contact.
content.summary: [flg] large cylindrical object with yellow-orange lights was faintly observable during an irregular flight path with hover

content.detailedDescription: Walking out last night for a cigarette i noticed a small red orb in the sky. i watched it for a couple seconds and brushed it off as a plane, thinking nothing of it. a minute or so goes by and i find myself gazing at it again. it has become much closer to my location and has another red orb of light pulsating steadily close to the constant red orb of light i first noticed. i watched these lights cross over my entire field of view in under a couple of minutes. still not too sure as to what aircraft has only the red light that pulsates like so and creates no noise at all. last night was one of the quietest nights i think i have ever experienced in this city. if anyone has any input as to what this ufo could be please share.
content.summary: Red pulsating orbs traveling across the dallas sky

content.detailedDescription:
Received phone call from co worker advising of two objects stationary and unidentified at a high altitude. proceeded outside with a fellow fire officer and witnessed two objects unidentifiable i would estimate the first to be our 11 o clock position the other our two o clock unknown altitude but higher than local beal afb or sac international traffic. called another friend who was to my north west she and her friend also witnessed the event by this point i would estimate 45 minutes had passed, both objects at same position however second object began a rapid descent and disappeared the other object remained motionless. neighbors watched, one displayed a photo via cell phone allegedly taken by his friend. the object had a clear to murky center outlined in white similar to a jellyfish, the shape was that of a jellyfish bell or jiffy pop bag but clearly very very large. received another phone call from co worker advising she had witnessed this before, on that occasion an object came out of the main and appeared to her to shoot the first then both disappeared. both objects observed this date seemed to vanish. 

now surely this could have been giant balloons but i have never observed balloons reman stationary especially at such an altitude. these were strange none of us could identify and very different than prior alleged sightings in oroville ca.
content.summary: Unexplained objects in sky above oroville ca multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription: Outside having a cigarette looking at stars to the east. 98% clear skies, clouds that were present were low level and thin to point of being transparent. noticed an oddly bright light heading towards me at high altitude. no other colors other than white, no blue or red blinking. object moving at estimated jet speeds. object started making slight turn to the south west and then quickly faded to tiny speck of light until i could no longer see it. object was in view for no more than 2 minutes. looking west now i saw airplane lights heading westbound from o'hare airport mid to low altitude(under 10,000 ft). watched plane for about 5 to 10 secs when a very similar near identical light suddenly appeared ahead of plane moving west at extremely high rate of speed was visible for only about a second or 2 and it was gone...
content.summary: Bright white light turned in sky, possibly ascending, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Over 30 years ago when i was 18 years of age (summer of 1980) i was house sitting at a single story residence.  i was alone in the unfurnished house, sleeping on the living room floor, in a corner of the room with blankets and personal belongings nearby.  i woke up sometime in the early am hours (2-4 am) sat up on my side with my right elbow as support, but remained on the floor.  

encounter:

from this position i immediately observed a floating orb of bright white light (golf ball sized at first) inside the room about 25 feet from my position, about 4 feet above the floor.  the orb of light moved slowly around the opposite end of the room and changed shapes as i watched motionless and bewildered.   to the best of my recollection the changes happened in this order:  it changed shape from golf ball sized to volleyball sized and back to golf ball sized, then from the golf ball size it became linier,  4-5 feet vertical about 1 inch thick, than back to circular shape the size of a golf ball.  then back to vertical linier shape and back to circular, golf ball sized. then from golf ball sized to smaller - almost pinpoint sized, but still quite bright.  these changes in shape were immediate.   while pinpoint sized it moved rapidly (flash like) through an opened slatted window that had a screen.  end of encounter

the window curtains were open, and it was still very dark out.   the entire encounter lasted about 30 seconds. what was so odd was the interior of the room did not get any brighter from this light source.  i remember immediately rationalizing the incident to myself, thinking it was some sort of reflection off the slatted window panels and went back to sleep, never getting up to check further.  the next few days i remember trying to find a source of light that could have made this happen, but no such lighting was ever found. 

i remember feeling bewildered but not afraid.  i don't know why i woke up at that particular moment in time, i didn't have to use the restroom and my normal wake up time was much later (about 6 am).  i was definitely not dreaming. weather that night was clear and about 55-65 degrees - typical summer weather for that time and place.

the single family residence is located on a cul-de-sac with the rear yard facing a golf course. the slatted window, where the object left the room, faces the rear yard/golf course.  if you are looking out this window from inside, no roads are within sight of the window.  there is a swimming pool in the rear yard that could have reflected light but i could never find a light source. i was at that residence for a few more weeks then moved out of the area.
  
note: 

i know what reflective light on an interior wall looks like and how it moves when cars or light sources pass by, more 2 dimensional, but this was quite different, not against the interior wall, but between the wall and myself (3 dimensional).  i have never seen anything like that since.  a modern day laser scanner is the closest thing to what i saw that night.
but even that description is insufficient.

throughout my life i have told only a few close friends about what i observed.  the reason i decided to put this in writing is so that you (mufon) have a record. possibly others have had similar experiences to this and may feel some comfort knowing others have seen these sorts of orbs/lights before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Summer 1980 - 30 second encounter with a bright orb of light that changed shapes while hovering/moving through the inside a room.

content.detailedDescription: 1)i was waiting for the number 3 or 4 bus(at west champion at prospect) near the worksource office here in b'ham ,when i noticed a very bright light hovering above bellingham bay about a mile or so from me.It was a clear day,light to no wind.2)i first noticed the object due to its size and extreme brightness.3)i had no idea what the object was in the sky,but i have never seen anything like it to this day(and i am in past thirty,and have made it a habit for years and years to look up at the sky every day in case i might see something).4)the object was about one-third the width of a full moon,and was entirely alight,so i didn't see any "shape".The object made no noise from my vantage point(and my hearing is very good).Also,the object hovered,but i looked harder and noticed it was moving very slowly southwards,but it did not loose altitude.5)i felt curious.I did not feel afraid,and the light wasn't blinding (i had a pair of prescription oakleys on while observing it).I also was somewhat excited about the possibility the ufo might be extraterrestrial in origin.6)i followed the object while walking to a different bus stop (on west holly),and told a man in a park to look out at the sky above the bay to see a ufo:he did.Then my bus arrived,by then i had lost site of the object,and would attempt to look for it while riding the bus northbound.When i disembarked,i walked about ten minutes in an area that obscured my view of the where the ufo had been seen by me (near bellingham technical college,at seaview avenue towards roeder avenue).What i did notice was a very bright object too bright to be a star in the same direction,but now farther west across the bay above the mountains.I went indoors for about an hour's time,when i went back outside it was dark,and could still see the unusually bright light at the same area.I walked downtown ,by that time,thirty minutes later,i no longer could see the very bright light.
content.summary: Waited for bus on clear day.Say unusualy bright light in sky.Couple in care near me also saw;they got out.
